name: Wesby
body: # Wesby - LOD Viewer Wesby is a generic linked open data visualization tool developed with Play! Framework. ## Quick start with Activator 1. Clone [Wesby repository](https://github.com/weso/Wesby) `https://github.com/weso/Wesby.git` 2. Get Typesafe Activator from [Play! Framework](http://www.playframework.com/download) and unzip it to a directory 3. Run Activator and import the Wesby directory ## Quick start with Play! 1. [Download](http://www.playframework.com/download) and [install](http://www.playframework.com/documentation/2.2.x/Installing) Play! Framework. 2. `mkdir Wesby` 3. `cd Wesby` 4. `git clone https://github.com/weso/Wesby.git` 5. `play` 6. `run` Develop: [![Build Status](https://api.travis-ci.org/weso/Wesby.png?branch=develop)](https://travis-ci.org/weso/Wesby)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
